xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/275487-Dem Bums: The Brooklyn Dodgers 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The beloved "Boys of Summer" are back in this landmark film -- Robinson, Reese, Campanella, Hodges and Snider. Live the history of the legendary "Bums" from Brooklyn from their beginnings in the 1880s through to the sad day they left Brooklyn forever in 1957. Dem Bums: The Brooklyn Dodgers
